author: davidcarbonis
body:
This PR contains a number of minor changes to the Phase 1 Pixel DQM code and an initial incarnation of the Phase 1 Pixel Validation code.
- The DQM scripts and code has been tweaked slightly in places in order to better reflect the current pixel DQM plot styling as to make it more accessible to current experts.
- The initial stable version of the Phase 1 Pixel Validation is committed. This is based off the DQM framework and inherits from the Common classes written for the new Pixel DQM. Currently it produces like for like plots of the current Pixel Validation plots. The code is invoked only for when the era is phase1. The output directory structure of the validation plots could change in the future as the current tracker validation code has both pixel and strips under a common tracking top directory - for now, the Phase 1 Pixel plots are saved in their own top directory.

(also @fioriNTU @schneiml @lunik1 )
title: Phase1pixel validation pre12
